i.name: Voracity
i.description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

q.name: Bouncing Blade
q.description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

w.name: Preparation
w.description: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.

e.name: Shunpo
e.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

r.name: Death Lotus
r.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

i1.blurb: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds. If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of '''Katarina''' damaging them, her  {{sti|cooldowns}} are reduced by 15 seconds.

{{sbc|Sinister Steel:}} Whenever '''Katarina''' retrieves a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing {{pp|18|68|72|77|82|89|96|103|112|121|131|142|154|166|180|194|208|224|240|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{pp|4|key=%|55 to 100|1 to 16}} AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and reducing {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina|Shunpo's}} {{sti|cooldown}} by {{pp|4|key=%|78 to 96|1 to 16}}.
i1.name: Voracity
notes: * ''Voracity's'' cooldown reduction will still take effect even after ''Katarina'' dies.
** However, the damage will not apply until it lands.

riot.name: Voracity
riot.description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of '''Katarina''' damaging them, her  {{sti|cooldowns}} are reduced by 15 seconds.

{{sbc|Sinister Steel:}} Whenever '''Katarina''' retrieves a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing {{pp|18|68|72|77|82|89|96|103|112|121|131|142|154|166|180|194|208|224|240|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{pp|4|key=%|55 to 100|1 to 16}} AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and reducing {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina|Shunpo's}} {{sti|cooldown}} by {{pp|4|key=%|78 to 96|1 to 16}}.
i2.name: Voracity
notes: * ''Voracity's'' cooldown reduction will still take effect even after ''Katarina'' dies.
** However, the damage will not apply until it lands.

riot.name: Voracity
riot.description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

riot.name: Bouncing Blade
riot.description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
riot.tooltip:
Katarina throws a Dagger, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the target and {{ e4 }} nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target.

The dagger always lands 350 units on the opposite side from where it struck the first target, getting there in the same amount of time regardless of how many times it bounces.

q1.blurb: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' throws a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} to the target enemy that bounces to up to 2 nearby enemies, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to each target.
The {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} then lands on the ground 350 units opposite from where it struck the target. The time to land from striking the target is the same regardless of distance traveled.
q1.name: Bouncing Blade
notes: * ''Bouncing Blades'' can hit targets in [[Sight|fog of war]] as well as [[stealth]]ed ones.
* ''Bouncing Blade'' will not stop if the target dies before hitting it but it will vanish mid-air if it targeted a vanishing [[Champion_summoned_units#decoys|decoy]].

riot.name: Preparation
riot.description: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.
riot.tooltip: Katarina tosses a <keywordMajor>Dagger</keywordMajor> into the air and gains {{ e4 }}% decaying movement speed over {{ e2 }} seconds.

w1.blurb: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' tosses a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} into the air above her current location and gains a decaying {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} until it lands after {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
w1.name: Preparation

riot.name: Shunpo
riot.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
riot.tooltip:
Katarina dashes in the blink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger. If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range.

Picking up a Dagger will reduce Shunpo's cooldown by {{ f1 }} seconds ({{ f3*100 }}%).

Katarina can blink to any location near the target.

e1.blurb: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a short delay, '''Katarina''' {{tip|blinks}} to the target location around the target unit or {{as|Dagger|buzzword}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the nearest enemy in range.
''Upon blinking, '''Katarina''' will then remain unable to attack, move or use abilities for {{fd|0.15}} seconds.''
e1.name: Shunpo
notes: * ''Shunpo'' should be an instant ability but it has extra logic inside it which makes it have a short cast time.
* ''Katarina'' cannot target [[wards]], but she can target objects such as allied {{cai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}}, {{cai|Dark Passage|Thresh}} or jungle plants.

* The cooldown starts on cast. Grabbing a {{as|Dagger|buzzword}} during its cast time will thus allow ''Shunpo'' to have its cooldown reduced after using it, even if there aren't any {{as|Daggers|buzzword}} on the blinked location.
* {{si|Flash}} can be used during cast time but it will not cancel the blink.
* If the target is very close to a wall and '''Katarina''' targets ''Shunpo'' behind the target, she can blink over the wall.

riot.name: Death Lotus
riot.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
riot.tooltip:
Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, rapidly throwing knives at the three nearest enemy champions, dealing {{ damagecalc }} magic damage per knife. Total over {{ duration }} seconds to each enemy: {{ totaldamagecalc }} magic damage.

Applies Grievous Wounds to all enemies struck, reducing their healing and regeneration by 40%.

r1.blurb: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Katarina''' rapidly {{ct|channel|channels|spins in place|cast=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false,false,melee|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,false}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, throwing a dagger every {{fd|0.166}} seconds to up to 3 nearby enemy champions, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and applying {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.
''Death Lotus'' cannot be cancelled by movement and basic attack commands in the first and last {{fd|0.25}} seconds of channeling.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Dagger|{{ap|25 to 50 3}} {{as|(+ 22% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 19% AP)}}|Total Single-Target Damage|{{ap|25*15 to 50*15 3}} {{as|(+ 330% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 285% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Death Lotus
notes: * ''Death Lotus'' cannot be activated unless there is at least one enemy champion in range.

** ''Katarina'' can activate ''Death Lotus'' even if nearby targets are in [[Sight|fog of war]] and/or [[stealth]]ed.  Due to this, it is possible to use the ability to scout in the [[sight|fog of war]] and provide pseudo [[stealth]] detection of enemy champions.
** Leaving ''Death Lotus'' radius while ''Katarina'' is channeling will not cause her to stop prematurely.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only one dagger.
